database.name: VIEW SBPC_INFO_PARTNERS_V
database.view: SELECT a.c_bpartner_id AS sbpc_info_partners_v_id, a.ad_client_id, a.ad_org_id, a.isactive, a.created, a.createdby, a.updated, a.updatedby, a.c_bpartner_id, a.c_bp_group_id, a.isvendor, a.iscustomer, a.isemployee, a.issalesrep, a.c_bpartner_id AS c_bpartner_id_tax, a.so_creditlimit, a.so_creditused, a.salesrep_id AS c_bpartner_id_name, a.em_sswh_taxpayer_id AS sswh_taxpayer_id, e.c_bpartner_location_id, e.c_location_id AS c_location_id_add1, e.c_location_id AS c_location_id_add2, e.c_location_id AS c_location_id_city, g.c_region_id, g.c_country_id, e.c_bpartner_location_id AS c_bpartner_location_id_phone1, e.c_bpartner_location_id AS c_bpartner_location_id_phone2, e.isbillto, e.isshipto, e.ispayfrom, f.ad_user_id, f.ad_user_id AS ad_user_id_email, f.ad_user_id AS ad_user_id_phone1, f.ad_user_id AS ad_user_id_phone2, a.c_bpartner_id AS c_bpartner_id_mail FROM c_bpartner a LEFT JOIN c_bpartner_location e ON a.c_bpartner_id = e.c_bpartner_id LEFT JOIN ad_user f ON a.c_bpartner_id = f.c_bpartner_id LEFT JOIN c_location g ON e.c_location_id = g.c_location_id
